original_text: So Joshua rose early in the morning and brought Israel near tribe by tribe, and the tribe of Judah was taken.
korean_text: 이에 여호수아가 아침 일찍이 일어나서 이스라엘을 그의 지파대로 가까이 나아오게 하였더니 유다 지파가 뽑혔고

sentences.original_text: So Joshua rose early in the morning
and brought Israel near tribe by tribe
and the tribe of Judah was taken.
